article_title: Palestinian leader appeals to US to stop Israel's Rafah offensive
sentence: The  current  war  began  when  Hamas  attacked  Israeli  communities  near  Gaza,  killing  about  1,200  people,  mainly  civilians,  and  taking  about  250  hostages.

article_title: Palestinian leader appeals to US to stop Israel's Rafah offensive
sentence: Some  133  hostages  are  believed  still  to  be  in  Gaza,  of  whom  about  30  are  thought  to  be  dead,  after  a  brief  truce  in  November  saw  some  hostages  released.

article_title: Palestinian leader appeals to US to stop Israel's Rafah offensive
sentence: Israel's  campaign  of  aerial  bombardment  and  ground  operations  in  Gaza  since  7  October  has  killed  34,454  people,  mostly  civilians,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  there.
